这里是AOH指挥部中心，接到管理层通知，前来询问你们在APOLLYON计划的进程.Translation: This is the AOH command center. We received a notice from management to inquire about your progress on the APOLLYON plan.

“长官，尽管遇到了一些挫折，我们还是圆满完成任务。我们从apollyon设施中带.Translation: “Sir, despite encountering some setbacks, we have successfully completed the mission. We brought back the final key 'Sirius' from the Apollyon facility.”

干得漂亮，我们永远信任衔尾蛇精英小队的办事能力。现如今，你们已经拿到了三把启动“.Translation: Well done, we always trust the capabilities of the Ouroboros elite team. Now, you have obtained three authorized keys to activate the 'Lighthouse,' namely 'South River Three,' 'Betelgeuse,' and 'Sirius.'

现在只剩下最后一把....Translation: Now only the last key remains...

它被前任灯塔操纵官安置在灯塔ALPHA基地中.Translation: It was placed in the Lighthouse ALPHA base by the former lighthouse operator.

这也是你们此行的最后一站....Translation: This is also the last stop of your journey...

战士们，你们已经越过重重困难，准备迎接你们最后的考验，既分高下，也决生死。.Translation: Warriors, you have overcome numerous difficulties and are ready to face your final test, which will determine both rank and life or death.

“我们会时刻响应指挥部的号令！”.Translation: “We will always respond to the command center's orders!”

但是，灯塔基地作为计划的最终目标，自然也藏有重重保护措施，外界的信号似乎无法向内.Translation: However, the Lighthouse base, as the final target of the plan, naturally has many protective measures. Signals from the outside seem unable to penetrate, and even the 'Twilight' system cannot modify its shielding frequency.

“长官，您的意思是...我们将无法接收到指挥部的指令与分析结果...”.Translation: “Sir, do you mean... we will be unable to receive commands and analysis results from the command center...”

正是如此，因此这里也被称作“落雪长眠之地”，因地处高纬极寒地带，基地外部常年被冰.Translation: Exactly, this place is also known as the 'Land of Snowy Slumber,' located in a high-latitude extreme cold zone. The base is covered in ice and snow all year round, surrounded by towering snow-capped mountains, making its concealment unique...

不过指挥部还是通过〈机神〉分析了那里的地形，利用地势差的明显变化找到了基地的一处.Translation: However, the command center analyzed the terrain there using the 'Machina' and found an entrance to the base by exploiting the noticeable changes in elevation.

在你们到来前，“落雪”小队负责对基地的探索，但是全部下落不明，无法再接收他们的救.Translation: Before your arrival, the 'Snowfall' team was responsible for exploring the base, but they have all gone missing and we can no longer receive their rescue signals. The command center suspects they have met with disaster, and if it is you, we hope you can find clues about them.

你们将继承他们的意志，启动灯塔，完成Ragnarok计划的最后一步….Translation: You will inherit their will, activate the lighthouse, and complete the final step of the Ragnarok plan...

“…了解，我们会尽力完成任务…”.Translation: “…Understood, we will do our best to complete the mission…”

“祝你们武运昌隆，衔尾蛇小队。循此苦旅，直抵群星。”.Translation: “Wishing you great success, Ouroboros team. Follow this arduous journey, and reach for the stars.”

这里的气候有些不对劲，快躲起来！.Translation: The weather here is a bit off, quick, hide!
